alert.note: Alert for Cassia (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Snow Squall Warning issued December 23 at 2:33AM MST until December 23 at 3:30AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Snow Squall Warning for... North central Cassia County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 330 AM MST. * At 231 AM MST, a dangerous snow squall was located near Lake Walcott, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Intense bursts of heavy snow. Gusty winds leading to blowing snow and visibility rapidly falling to less than one-quarter mile. Wind gusts greater than 50 mph could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Travel will become difficult and potentially dangerous within minutes. Locations impacted include... Yale Rest Area and Interstate 84 And 86 Junction. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Reduce speed and turn on headlights! During snow squalls, the visibility may suddenly drop to near zero in whiteout conditions. SNOW SQUALL...RADAR INDICATED
